data_descriptor.name: office_staying_time
data_descriptor.description: Office staying time (total time between first entering time into the office location and last departure time from office location) according to GPS location model

data_descriptor.name: verdict
data_descriptor.description: Analysis of the staying time which is one of the three verdict: 1. less_than_usual 2. more_than_usual 3. usual_staying_time. Usual time is a range from (mean - standard_deviation) to (mean + standard_deviation). The staying time which are less than usual time are labeled less_than_usual and the staying time which are more than usual are labeled as more_than_usual, the staying time which are in the range of  usual time are labeled as usual_staying_time.

data_descriptor.name: deviation
data_descriptor.description: How much deviated from the usual time (in minutes).

data_descriptor.name: verdict_int
data_descriptor.description: 0 - less than usual, 1 - usual or more than usual

algorithm.description: Staying time in office with verdict of usual, more than usual or less than usual time. Sample is a list with three elements as follows: 0 - Total staying time in minutes, 1 - verdict (more_than_usual, less_than_usual, usual_staying_time), 2 - deviation from the usual staying time in minutes.
